text: Following a biological event in Gila Bend Indian Reservation, AZ (FIPS 04013), our model predicts the following workforce impacts. Education is projected to lose 58% of jobs, recovering in approximately 12 months. Energy sees a 36% demand increase, peaking around month 3. Healthcare is projected to lose 95% of jobs, recovering in approximately 12 months. Nonprofit sees a 39% demand increase, peaking around month 9. Other sees a 43% demand increase, peaking around month 15. Retail & Hospitality sees a 54% demand increase, peaking around month 9.
